response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you. I propose to sell it to you for $14,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the value you receive and my business interests. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 14000}
